info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 17 at 3:28AM HST until November 17 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .Large and rough surf associated with strong trades and a northeast swell will maintain hazardous conditions along east facing shores today. Surf heights along east facing shores will slowly decline from tonight through the weekend. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 12 feet. * WHERE...East facing shores of Kauai, Maui, Molokai, Oahu and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
